title: A legitimate thank you to RIOT :)
body:
Firstly I would like to express my gratitude to RIOT. Thankyou.

I truly appreciate this new report system, it is a more more complex and defined way of showing that we disliked a certain players behaviour.

On behalf of all trolls, I would like to thankyou that it does absolutely nothing. That i can continue to troll for as long as I like and say whatever I want.
I really like how it seems like its doing more but really its just a shinier piece of shit that does nothing. Thankyou for allowing trolls with multiple accounts to keep on keeping on. xoxo love all trolls everywhere <3
